title: Financial Analyst in a Retail Setting Job at Yoh (South Deerfield, MA)
text:
Source: Jobg8 
Consumer/Retail Financial Analyst needed for a Permanent opportunity with Yoh's client located in South Deerfield, MA. 
Top Skills Should You Possess: - Bachelor Degree in Accounting/Finance is a must - Must have at least 3-5 years of Financial Analyst experience in a Consumer or Retail Setting - Must have solid Financial analytical and reporting skills - Intermediate to Advanced MS Office Skills, with a focus on Excel and Access 
What You'll Be Doing: - Advise and assist senior management on significant issues within the supported business units - Act as business partner to account/channel stakeholders by developing tools that enhance business analytics - Prepare accounting entries and maintain related records and analyses that properly record and document financial activities - Annual budgeting and reforecasting processes - Optimizing trade fund spending by evaluating promotional opportunities 
What You Need to Bring to the Table: - Bachelor Degree in Accounting/Finance is a must - Must have at least 3-5 years of Financial Analyst experience in a Consumer or Retail Setting - Must have solid Financial analytical and reporting skills - Experience in financial schedules and analyses to be used at Period Reviews, Annual Plan Reviews, Quarterly Division Financial Update - Intermediate to Advanced MS Office Skills, with a focus on Excel and Access 
Opportunity is Calling, Apply Now! 
Recruiter: Christine Torres 
Email: (see below) 
Yoh, a Day & Zimmermann company, is an Equal Opportunity Employer, M/F/D/V. Contact us if you are an individual with a disability and require accommodation in the application process. 
J2W: PROF
